name: My Shadow and I
description:
Made for the United Game Jam 2020 (Theme was Two).

There's two contrasting squares that you control at the same time.

A short puzzle game where you must maneuver two entities, a light square and its shadow, through an increasingly complex maze of corridors.  Where the light square moves, its shadow will follow. The light square can only move through dark tiles and the dark square can only move through light tiles.

===========================================

Controls :

W - Jump

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Enter - Interact with the mirror gates to go to the next level & interact with levers

Click on the speaker icon to turn music on/off

Levers cannot be switched if it would cause one of the squares to go inside of a tile of the same color

===========================================

Game made by Diego Fernandez

Game made using LibGDX

Music made using Bosca Ceoil
